com.kontakt.sdk.android.ble.rssi

Interface RssiCalculator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CustomRssiCalculator, LimitedMeanRssiCalculator

    public interface RssiCalculator
    Rssi calculator was designed to manipulate RSSI signal and parameter directly dependent on it - Proximity. Proper calculation of Rssi is significant from the point of view of dynamic actions search.
